lexiemayer.name: Lexie Mayer
lexiemayer.desc: She is the station Nurse. She is kind, always wanting to help others. Always is saying sarcastic jokes to lighten the mood of others.

sarahforrest.name: Sarah Forrest
sarahforrest.desc: Jealous, condescending, inconsiderate towards others. Is always being fake towards everyone. Very selfish and believes she is the most important/intelligent one in the team. Is one of the Engineers present on the ship.

tyancriploens.name: Tyan Criploens
tyancriploens.desc: Incredible smart computer scientist, knows how to work around software. He is your best friend since stepped foot onto the space craft.
